name: Go home Carl, you're drunk
description:
Description
Go home Carl, you're drunk is about controlling one half of Carl, a bartender who may have had a few too many while on the job. Players collaborate to serve cocktails to bar patrons while each controlling one of Carl's arms. Make your friends enemies in this (un)cooperative physics simulator!

Controls

You can either play with 2 controllers, or with 1 controller and 1 keyboard.

Controller: Move with analog sticks (both of them!) - Grab with triggers (All of them!)

Keyboard: Move with WASD and arrow keys combined and grab with the spacebar.

Credits
Ida Lindballe Lønborg - Artist
Ryan Wright - Designer
Jordy van Opstal - Programmer
Roxanne van Dam - Programmer
